94.plot: Esteban was a simple worker in the farm "La Benavente" that fell in love with Victoria. But after years, Acacia, her daughter returns after living with her grandparents and Esteban is lustful towards her .

imdb.plot outline: The story of Acacia Benavente, a girl who loses her father Alonso in an accident while he was riding his horse. When her mother Cristina finds love again after being widowed for just a year, Acacia is enraged and leaves the ranch in which they live in to go live with her grandparents. She returns 12 years later, now a stunningly beautiful young woman and without her realizing it, awakens in Esteban, her stepfather, a deep and passionate desire.
imdb.title: La Malquerida
plot: The story of Acacia Benavente, a girl who loses her father Alonso in an accident while he was riding his horse. When her mother Cristina finds love again after being widowed for just a year, Acacia is enraged and leaves the ranch in which they live in to go live with her grandparents. She returns 12 years later, now a stunningly beautiful young woman and without her realizing it, awakens in Esteban, her stepfather, a deep and passionate desire.::Anonymous
